question: Will Shai Gilgeous-Alexander score 30+ points against the Nuggets?
description:
This market refers to the Oklahoma City Thunder NBA playoff game six versus the Denver Nuggets, scheduled for May 15, 7:00 PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scores more than 29.5 points in his game against the Nuggets. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If this game is cancelled, postponed past May 21, or Shai Gilgeous-Alexander otherwise doesn't play in the game, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be the NBA (https://www.nba.com).

question: Aces vs Liberty
description:
In the upcoming WNBA game, scheduled for May 17 at 1:00PM ET:
If the Las Vegas Aces win, the market will resolve to "Aces".
If the New York Liberty win, the market will resolve to "Liberty".
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Trump say "Deal" 10+ times during May 16 Baier interview?
description:
An interview of Donald Trump by Bret Baier is scheduled to air on May 16. You can read more about that here: https://www.foxnews.com/media/fox-news-channel-air-special-editions-special-report-hannity-live-from-middle-east

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump says the listed term during this interview. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the term regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the term will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Instances where the term is used in a compound word will count regardless of context (e.g. joyful is not a compound word for "joy," however "killjoy" is a compounding of the words "kill" and "joy").

If this interview is definitively cancelled by Donald Trump or Fox, or otherwise is not released by May 17, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No". If the interview has not aired in its entirety by May 17, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve based on what has aired up to that point.

The resolution source will be audio/video of the interview.
